akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 96–465, title II, § 2205(5), Oct. 17, 1980, 94 Stat. 2160

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 901a. Repealed. Pub. L. 96–465, title II, § 2205(5), Oct. 17, 1980, 94 Stat. 2160
Section, Pub. L. 93–126, § 6, Oct. 18, 1973, 87 Stat. 452; Pub. L. 93–475, § 4(a), Oct. 26, 1974, 88 Stat. 1440; Pub. L. 96–187, title I, § 112(e)(2), Jan. 8, 1980, 93 Stat. 1366, related to campaign contribution report by nominees for ambassador or minister.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Feb. 15, 1981, except as otherwise provided, see section 2403 of Pub. L. 96–465, set out as an Effective Date note under section 3901 of this title.
